tasks.label: vccvdv457export-dev
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file dev.env up -d --build --no-deps vcc-vdv457-export

tasks.label: vccproxy-dev
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file dev.env up -d --build --force-recreate --no-deps vcc-proxy
